Peter and Jack are looking for John. They are going to play basketball. What do we know about John? Look and listen ◆ Listen again and answer 2 two Look! John is over there. He’s talking with his friends. Is he wearing a blue and white T-shirt? No. He is wearing a blue T-shirt. And he’s holding a basketball. Oh! He’s cool! John, this is my cousin, Jack. Nice to meet you, Jack. Nice to meet you, too. Jack likes playing basketball, too. Great! Let’s go and play. ◆ Listen again and act Look at that boy! Is it John? Which one? The tall and thin boy. No. That is Tom. John is tall and strong. Jack: Peter: Jack: Peter: Peter: Jack: Peter: Jack: Peter: John: Jack: Peter: John: Look, listen and say 3 Look and say John is tall and strong. He’s wearing a blue T-shirt. He’s holding a basketball. three Look and practise short and thin Fangfang Ms Zhang tall and beautiful Xiaoyu short and strong Mr Wang tall and thin 4 Enjoy reading four You have a new home. You have a new home now. 1. What did Sally want? 2. What did Sally say to the toy bear? ◆ Read again and answer Sally’s mother bought the toy bear for her. Sally was very happy. She played with the toy bear at home. “You have a new home now, dear! Are you happy?” Sally said to the toy bear. Yesterday, Sally saw a toy bear in the toy shop. “Mum, I like that bear. It’s wearing a beautiful red coat. Can I have it for my birthday?” asked Sally. “But your birthday is in October,” said mum. “Please! I like it very much,” said Sally. 5 Who is he? Is he Peter? He is tall. He is thin. Yes, he is. five Play a game He is wearing blue shorts

chunks.content: . She’s going to Harbin next Friday. Can Rose wear her new skirt next Friday? Why? thirteen ◆ Listen again and answer 14 fourteen ◆ Listen again and act Hi, Peter. I’m going to Harbin next Friday. Is it cold there? Yes. It’s winter here. But it’s summer in Sydney. It’s hot. I often swim in the sea. I’m wearing a T-shirt now. Cool! But it’s cold in Harbin. Please take your sweater and coat. Is there any snow in Harbin? Yes! It’s going to snow next week. We are going to ski and make a snowman. Great! The snowman can wear my T-shirt! Hah-hah! What do you think of the boy? sixteen ◆ Read again and answer In London, it’s not very hot in summer and not very cold in winter. But there’s a lot of rain in summer there. It is a sunny day. Mr Smith is walking in a park. He feels happy. Suddenly, it begins to rain. But he doesn’t bring an umbrella with him. He feels cold. “Hi! We can share this umbrella.” A boy is holding an umbrella behind him. Mr Smith feels warm now. He thanks the boy. 17 In my hometown, it’s warm in spring. I wear... The children are talking about their holiday plans. nineteen Where is Lingling going for the holiday? A. B. ◆ Listen again and tick 20 twenty ◆ Listen again and act May Day is coming. What are you going to do for the holiday? I’m going to have a picnic with my parents. What about you? I’m going to take a trip. Where are you going? I’m going to Beijing with my father. What are you going to do there? I’m going to visit the Great Wall and the Summer Palace. Beijing Roast Duck is very good. You can have a try. All right. Thank you. Sally: Tom: Sally: Tom: Sally: Tom: Sally: Tom: Sally: Look, listen and say 21 A: What are you going to do for the holiday? B: I’m going to take a trip. A: Where are you going? B: I’m going to Beijing. A: What are you going to do there? B: I’m going to visit the Great Wall. twenty-one Look and say Look and practise Qingdao Sichuan Tai’an Hangzhou swim in the sea see pandas climb Mount Taishan visit the West Lake 22 Enjoy reading Where are you going? Harbin is in the north of China. It’s very cold in winter there. Do you want to see an ice palace? Go to Harbin’s Ice and Snow Festival. It’s wonderful! Xinjiang is in the west of China. The blue sky, green grass and white sheep make Xinjiang beautiful. People in Xinjiang like singing and dancing. It’s a very interesting place. There is no winter in Hainan. You can enjoy beautiful beaches all year round. You can also eat many kinds of fruits there

chunks.content: ... I’m going to... ◆ Ask and answer ◆ Talk about your holiday plan Hangzhou Shanghai Qingdao 27 twenty-seven Tom was missing. His parents asked the police for help. “Please tell me something about him,” said the policeman. “He is short,” said Tom’s father. “He is wearing brown shorts, white shoes and a yellow shirt,” said Tom’s mother. Soon Tom’s photo was on TV. A man saw Tom. He called Tom’s father and the police. In the evening, the police found Tom and took him home. 1. Who did Tom’s father ask for help? 2. What did Tom wear? 3. Who took Tom home? Find the differences Lingling is holding an apple in Picture 1. Lingling is holding a pear in Picture 2. Read and answer Picture 1Picture 2 28 twenty-eight Read and fill Bill is tall. He has hair. He is wearing trousers, shoes and a T-shirt. He is holding a in his hand. If you can’t find your way home or your parents, don’t worry! ◆ Read and tick Bill 130 cm brown hair, blue trousers, white shoes, a white T-shirt, a toy car in hand People’s Supermarket May 6th Mr Smith, 170-0678-3256 Name: Height: Appearance: Place: Time: Please call: A Missing Boy ●Don’t walk here and there. Wait at the place. ●Don’t cry. Ask the police for help. 29 twenty-nine Peter is looking for Ann. Make a sentence to help him find her. Look and say thirty-nine Look and practise Xinjiang Hangzhou a great place a beautiful citygo shopping eat grapes 40 Dear mum, Dad and I went to the Summer Palace today. It’s a very beautiful park. It has many famous buildings. There is also a big lake in it. It’s Kunming Lake. There is a big stone boat on the lake. We rowed a boat on the lake. We ate Beijing Roast Duck for dinner today. It was very good. We also ate jiaozi. I can’t use chopsticks. I ate with my hands. Beijing is a great city. We had a good time today. Love, Sally 1. What did Sally do in the Summer Palace? 2. What did Sally have for dinner? Enjoy reading forty ◆ Read again and answer m Email ▲ ▲ 41 Have a free talk forty-one The Summer Palace is... My hometown is... Tom and his parents went to the park by bike. In the park, Tom f lew a kite and played games. His parents talked and laughed. After lunch, they put the waste in a big bag. Tom saw a baby bird in the grass. “Come here, Dad!” said Tom. Dad ran to him. “Look! The baby bird can’t f ly. Where’s its mum?” said Tom. “Over there! In the tree!” said dad. Then they put the bird back home. The mother bird was very happy. And Tom was happy, too. A Baby Bird 47 Show a photo of your travel. chunks.content: . Look and say fifty-one Ask and answer A: What are you doing? B: I’m... A: Who is it for? B: I’m going to give it to... 52 1. When did John begin to study English? 2. Do the pupils like Miss Wang? Why? Enjoy reading fifty-two ◆ Read again and answer Dear Miss Wang, Four years ago, you became my first English teacher. You were young and beautiful. You often had a big smile on your face. Your class was very interesting. We all felt very happy. My English was not good at first, but you helped me a lot. Now I like English very much. Thank you for your help. It’s time to say goodbye to our school. I’m going to miss you. Best wishes to you! Love, John 53 What are you going to say to your teacher? You helped me a lot. I like English and I love you. You’re always kind to us. Thanks! I am going to study hard. You are a great teacher. fifty-three Say goodbye to your teacher or your friends 54 Dear , t’s time to say goodbye now And so before you go, We’d like to tell you something that We think you’d like to know We’ll start our new school days, We’ll miss you My dear teachers and friends, Won’t you please come back again? Write to your teacher fifty-four Enjoy a poem t’s time to say goodbye now It’s time to say goodbye. Best wishes to you! I can express my wishes wi t h: I know t his word: kind Check and tick 55 Revision 2 fifty-five Sally is going to buy the hat for her mum and the hat for her grandma. Can I help you? ... ◆ Ask and answer Look, listen and fill 56 fifty-six ◆ Talk about your last weekend in groups Look, listen and match 57 fifty-seven My Trip to Sanya I took a trip to Sanya with my family for the May Day holiday. We went there by plane. First we went to see the beautiful beach and swam in the sea. Then we had seafood for lunch. We also went to the fruit market and bought a lot of fruits. Then we climbed the mountains and took a lot of beautiful pictures. The city was beautiful. It was a great trip. We all had a good time. Talk about your holiday I went to..

metadata.source: 六年级下册英语广西接力版电子课本.pdf

chunks.content: . We went there by plane. First we went to see the beautiful beach and swam in the sea. Then we had seafood for lunch. We also went to the fruit market and bought a lot of fruits. Then we climbed the mountains and took a lot of beautiful pictures. The city was beautiful. It was a great trip. We all had a good time. Talk about your holiday I went to... with... We... Read and number 58 eat a lot send to hospital fifty-eight Sammy was a little dog. One day, he was very hungry. He saw a small bone under a tree. He picked it up. Then he went back home. On his way home, Sammy came to a river. He looked into the water. He saw a dog with a big bone in his mouth. Sammy wanted to get the big bone. He opened his mouth. The small bone fell into the water. The dog in the water was gone, too. He was very sad. He walked home very slowly. He was still hungry. ◆ Read again and answer How many dogs are there in the story? Talk about the pictures Enjoy reading a birthday party have a stomachache 59 fifty-nine Look and match climb mountains ride a bike row a boat take pictures make a card draw a picture Look, read and number It’s a famous street. We can eat some nice food there. It’s a great park. There is a big lake in it. Some old people are singing Beijing Opera. They’re happy. Many people know about the wall.
